body_html:
Here's some notes I wrote up numpy broadcasting semantics and how to apply them to torch: https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Broadcasting-Notes

If you are interested on how this applies to more than pointwise operations (implemented in #1563), you may find it interesting.
body_text:
Here's some notes I wrote up numpy broadcasting semantics and how to apply them to torch: https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Broadcasting-Notes
If you are interested on how this applies to more than pointwise operations (implemented in #1563), you may find it interesting.
body:
Here's some notes I wrote up numpy broadcasting semantics and how to apply them to torch: https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/wiki/Broadcasting-Notes

If you are interested on how this applies to more than pointwise operations (implemented in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1563), you may find it interesting.
